com.dautelle.math
Class Rational

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Number
      com.dautelle.math.RealtimeNumber
          com.dautelle.math.Rational
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable, Operable, Realtime, Representable, java.io.Serializable
public final class Rational
extends RealtimeNumber
implements java.lang.Comparable, Operable, Representable

This class represents the ratio of two LargeInteger numbers.

Instances of this class can be used to find exact solutions to linear equations with the Matrix class.

Version:
6.0, February 1, 2004
Author:
Jean-Marie Dautelle
See Also:
Serialized Form

opposite

public Operable opposite()
Description copied from interface: Operable
Returns the additive inverse of this object. It is the object such as this.plus(this.opposite()) == ZERO, with ZERO being the additive identity.

Specified by:

reciprocal

public Operable reciprocal()
Description copied from interface: Operable
Returns the multiplicative inverse of this object. It it the object such as this.times(this.reciprocal()) == ONE , with ONE being the multiplicative identity.

Specified by:
reciprocal in interface Operable
Returns:
ONE / this.
